readability_analysis.comment: Score of 68 is slightly below optimal but within acceptable range. Text is clear, accessible Grade 7-8 reading level.

technical_terminology_ratio.assessment: All technical terms are properly explained in context

concrete_examples_with_numbers.evidence: Price ranges (€2000-€8000), timeline (8-12 months), cost breakdown (€20-€50/month insurance), health check costs (€200-€400), total 5-year budget (€15000-€30000), transport costs (€500-€2000)

own_photos_or_videos.evidence: No images/videos embedded in markdown (would be handled in publication phase)

first_person_perspective.evidence: Uses 'du', 'dein', 'lass mich klare Zahlen geben', 'hier ist deine Schritt-für-Schritt Checkliste' - strong personal engagement

actionable_recommendations.evidence: Multiple actionable items: 'Verhandle für min. 6 Monate', 'Fachanwalt für Tierkauf konsultieren', 'Escrow-Service nutzen', 'Versicherung SOFORT abschließen'

checklists_step_by_step.evidence: Comprehensive 25-point checkliste in 3 phases (Online, Besichtigung, Post-Kauf)

author_credentials.evidence: Credentials would be shown on publication page, not in markdown. Content demonstrates expert knowledge but author bio missing.

technical_term_mastery.evidence: 6+ technical terms correctly explained: OCD, ERU, Equidenpass, AKU, Gewährleistung, BGB - demonstrates deep domain knowledge

professional_experience_signals.evidence: References to FN (Deutsche Reiterliche Vereinigung), specific breed knowledge (Hannoveraner, Oldenburger, Friese), understanding of breed-specific pricing, veterinary standards

recent_statistics.evidence: December 2024 market data, current pricing from ehorses/pferde.de, €20-€50/month insurance costs, breed-specific pricing

official_guidelines.evidence: References to BGB Kaufrecht, EU-Verordnung 504/2008 (Equidenpass), FN standards

statistical_claims_with_sources.evidence: Prices cited with market source (ehorses/pferde.de Dec 2024), health cost ranges (€200-€400 AKU), insurance costs (€20-€50/month)

transparent_limitations.evidence: Acknowledges 'RED FLAG prices' (€300-€600), 'Fallstricke vermeiden', warns about risks, mentions 'medizinische Vorgeschichte oft unbekannt' for rescue horses

pros_and_cons_balance.evidence: For each age group (Säugling/Absetzer/Jährling): listed both Vorteile AND Nachteile. For financing: shows escrow risks (3-5% cost)

risks_acknowledged.evidence: Mentions risks (OCD, ERU, theft indicators, health risks) but could expand on fraud risks more

metadata_check.title_issues: 1 character short of optimal range but still good for display

content_length_delta.assessment: Our article is 234% longer than top 3 median. This is EXCEPTIONAL depth - shows comprehensive guide vs. marketplace listings.

Wie erkenne ich ein gutes Fohlen? → Section 4 (Rote Flaggen, Gesundheit)
Kann man Pferde vom Schlachter kaufen? → FAQ Section
Was ist die teuerste OP? → Section 4 & 7 (OCD costs, Insurance)
Kann ein 2-jähriger Hengst decken? → Not covered (breeding-specific, low intent)
Ist 30 alt für ein Pferd? → Not covered (general knowledge, not buying-relevant)
paa_coverage_analysis.note: Covers 6/9 PAAs with 50+ word answers each. 2 PAAs are breeding/age-general knowledge not relevant to buying intent.

intent_match_assessment.informational_intent: Strong - Explains health risks, legal concepts, financial implications

emotional_trigger_power_word.evidence: Title uses 'kompletter Ratgeber' (complete guide) - authority signal, not emotional. Could use power words like 'Ultimativ', 'Sicher', 'Bewährt'.
emotional_trigger_power_word.recommendation: Could strengthen with emotional trigger but current is strong

number_or_year.evidence: 2025 included in title for currency signal

unique_angle.evidence: 'kompletter Ratgeber' differentiates from marketplace listings (ehorses, pferde.de)

strong_hook_first_10_words.evidence: 'Fohlen kaufen - Ultimativer Ratgeber 2025' = immediate value + authority

benefit_oriented.evidence: Lists benefits: 'Marktplätze, Preise, Gesundheitschecks, Rechtliches. Schritt-für-Schritt + Checkliste' - answers key user questions

cta_present.evidence: Implied CTA through 'Checkliste' and comprehensive guide positioning - action-oriented

content_hook_100_words.first_100_words: Fohlen kaufen ist verlockend – schließlich kostet ein junges Pferd deutlich weniger als ein ausgewachsenes. Doch hier lauert ein großes Risiko: Der Fohlenkauf ist medizinisch komplexer und rechtlich tückischer, als viele Anfänger erwarten. Versteckte Krankheiten, unbekannte Charakterzüge und mangelnde Absicherung können Jahre später zu teuren Problemen führen. Dieser Ratgeber zeigt dir alle Schritte vom ersten Gedanken bis zum Kaufvertrag. Du erfährst, wo die besten Marktplätze sind, welche Preise realistisch sind, worauf Tierärzte beim Gesundheitscheck achten, und wie du dich rechtlich absicherst. Mit praktischer Checkliste und klaren Empfehlungen.

problem_statement.evidence: 'Doch hier lauert ein großes Risiko: Der Fohlenkauf ist medizinisch komplexer...' - identifies user pain points

promise.evidence: 'Dieser Ratgeber zeigt dir alle Schritte vom ersten Gedanken bis zum Kaufvertrag' - clear promise of complete solution

credibility_anchor.evidence: 'Mit praktischer Checkliste und klaren Empfehlungen' - establishes expertise + practical tools

overall_quality_calculation.scoring_formula: Weighted Average: (Content Quality × 20%) + (Readability × 15%) + (E-E-A-T × 20%) + (SEO Technical × 10%) + (Competitive Positioning × 15%) + (Search Intent × 10%) + (Click-Worthiness × 10%)

warnings.message: Article length (3847 words) is 214% above target (1800). This is POSITIVE for E-E-A-T/depth but may impact mobile readability. Recommend: Keep full depth but consider progressive disclosure (expandable sections) in frontend implementation.

PAA coverage is 67% (6/9). This is ACCEPTABLE but below 80% target. Missing coverage: 'Kann ein 2-jähriger Hengst decken?' (breeding-specific, low buying intent) and 'Ist 30 alt für ein Pferd?' (general knowledge, not buying-relevant). Not critical for publication.
Meta description is 139 characters (target 150-160). This is ACCEPTABLE - still displays fully in SERP. Recommend: Could add 10-20 characters to maximize description real estate if desired.
Title is 49 characters (target 50-60). Acceptable - only 1 character short of optimal range. Displays fully on desktop SERP.

recommendations.recommendation: Implement progressive disclosure for long sections (3000+ word article). Use expandable subsections or tabbed interface for mobile readability.
recommendations.implementation: Frontend component: Add accordion/tabs for Sections 4-7 (lengthy sections)

seo_performance_prediction.reasoning: Article significantly exceeds competitor depth (234% longer than top 3), comprehensive E-E-A-T signals (8.6/10), addresses all major must-have topics (100% coverage), and provides value beyond marketplace listings. Marktplätze (Rank 1-5) will remain, but content article can capture 'buying guide' queries alongside marketplace results.
competitive_advantages: Only educational content guide vs. 9/10 marketplace listings in current SERP
Practical checklists and actionable advice (missing in top 10)
seo_performance_prediction.ranking_timeline: Indexing: 1-2 days | Initial ranking: 2-4 weeks | Top 10: 2-3 months | Top 5: 3-6 months (depends on backlink profile)
